title: Boulevard and Advocate ClickTight: Securing Your Child
description:
How to secure your child in a Britax Boulevard ClickTight or Advocate ClickTight convertible car seat. 
**Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
How to secure your child in a Britax Boulevard ClickTight or Advocate ClickTight convertible car seat. 
**Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.
For more information about Britax ClickTight convertible car seats, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/clicktight-convertibles

transcripts: To properly harness your child to loosen the harness by pushing the harness adjuster button and pulling both harness straps forward. Open the chest clip and buckle. Attach the harness straps to the harness holders. Place your child in the seat ensuring their sitting upright and not slouching with their back up against the child seat back. Position the harness straps around your child. Then fasten the buckle. Check for proper harness tight and pull any excess slack up to your child's shoulder area before tightening. Pull the adjuster strap up and away from the child seat to tighten until an audible click is heard from the clip that is a feature. Check that the harness is snug around your child. A snug strap should not allow you to pinch excess at the shoulder. If there is excess pull the adjuster strap again until an audible click is heard. Close the chess club and position and your child's armpit level. Adjust the chest pads to be comfortable. Within range of the correctly position chest clip.
